name: GitHub - Fix monospace font-family
description: On my computer, GitHub's default font-family specification (which almost always has Monaco,'Bitstream Vera Sans Mono','Courier New' at the start) results in Courier New being the default font used for every monospaced element. This style just switches every declaration of font-family that I could find to use the 'monospace' system default instead. This would be the one you can set in the Firefox preferences or your system fonts settings.
css:
/* AGENT_SHEET */
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("github.com") {

    #ace-editor,
    #code_search_instructions table.instruction tr td.inst,
    #code_search_results .result .snippet,
    #files .file .meta .info,
    #files .meta .info,
    #forkqueue table td.human,
    #forkqueue table td.message,
    #forkqueue table td.sha,
    #fq-commit .commit_oneline .commit,
    #fq-commit .commit_oneline .tree,
    #gollum-dialog- dialog #gollum-dialog-dialog-body fieldset input.code,
    #gollum-editor #gollum-editor-body,
    #gollum-editor .expanded textarea,
    #toc .path,
    #toc,
    #wiki-history table td.commit-name a,
    #wiki-history tbody td.commit-name a,
    .add-pill-form textarea.key_value,
    .blob-editor textarea,
    .commit .commit-desc pre,
    .commit .sha,
    .commit .sha-block,
    .commit-preview .message p.commit-id,
    .commit-ref,
    .commits-condensed code,
    .commits-condensed tr.merge td.author,
    .commits-condensed tr.merge td.date,
    .file-box .meta .info,
    .file-editor-textarea,
    .kbd,
    .linux #files .file .data pre,
    .linux #files .file .data td.line_numbers,
    .linux #files .file .line-data,
    .linux #files .file .line-number,
    .linux .file-box .data pre,
    .linux .file-box .data td.line_numbers,
    .linux .file-box .line-data,
    .linux .file-box .line-number,
    .merge-pr .commit-preview .message textarea,
    .news code,
    .news pre,
    .sha,
    .sha-block,
    .windows #files .file .data pre,
    .windows #files .file .data td.line_numbers,
    .windows #files .file .line-data,
    .windows #files .file .line-number,
    .windows .file- box .data pre,
    .windows .file-box .data td.line_numbers,
    .windows .file-box .line-data,
    .windows .file-box .line-number,
    code,
    dl.keyboard-mappings dt,
    input.url-field,
    pre,
    pre.pages-404,
    textarea.commit- message
    {
        font-family: monospace !important;
    }
}
